health_tech: FHIR API for healthcare data exchange

evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for cloud services including Lambda and S3.
Zoom My Life ensures HIPAA compliance for its health-tech solutions.
Integration with third-party APIs is facilitated through RESTful interface.
The Twilio API is leveraged for communication functionalities in the platform.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or EDI use cases found on their site.
